sections.title: Consulting & Advisory
sections.description: Plan and adopt GitOps efficiently. Our experts assess your current pipelines and provide actionable recommendations for faster, automated deployments.

Audit infrastructure for readiness and maturity.
Create a roadmap and continuous deployment plan aligned with business goals.
Recommend the best tools for faster, single-button software releases.

sections.title: GitOps Implementation - Dev to Production
sections.description: Build or migrate CI/CD pipelines to GitOps-based workflows. Automate releases and enable multi-cluster, multi-cloud deployments.
offerings: Implement GitOps frameworks using ArgoCD, FluxCD, Helm, and Kustomize.
Manage cluster states with drift detection and auto-correction.
Use Infrastructure as Code for cloud-native apps.
Enable quick rollouts and rollbacks across clusters.
Organize repositories following GitOps best practices.

sections.title: Enterprise Support Services
sections.description: Expert support to troubleshoot configuration issues and maintain GitOps pipelines using tools like ArgoCD, FluxCD, Helm, and Kustomize.
offerings: Real-time monitoring and logging to prevent pipeline failures.
Ensure regular updates, patches, and bug fixes for GitOps tools.

sections.title: GitOps Tools Training
sections.description: Empower your engineers with the knowledge to manage GitOps workflows confidently.
offerings: Hands-on workshops for ArgoCD, FluxCD, Helm, Terragrunt, and Werf.
Master GitOps concepts: Continuous Delivery, declarative infra, drift detection, single source of truth, pull-based deployments.
Best practice guidance for configuration and deployment changes.
